title: Melissa Brown Love of My Life Series 1-4 epub
description:
Bouquet Toss (Love of My Life #1) by Melissa Brown 
Ever since Daphne Harper graduated from college, all of her friends have fallen in love, become engaged and walked down the aisle. Be it a blessing or a curse, Daphne (a hopeless romantic and perpetual single girl) catches the bouquet at every single wedding she attends. 
DaphneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s love life is a mess. Her first love, Mayson, haunts her heart and keeps her from pursuing happiness with any man who comes along. As she struggles to move on from the one who got away, Daphne wonders if she will ever break her curse and find her happily ever after.

image

Champagne Toast (Love of My Life #2) by Melissa Brown 
Kate Armour and Evan Maxwell fell hard and fast for each other while attending college. Their once passionate and loving relationship ended when old scars eventually tore them apart. Two years after their breakup, they're each struggling to piece together what went wrong in an attempt to move forward.
Kate, a no-nonsense bartender, must face her past while attempting to focus on her future.
Evan is stifled by his bitter heart, which threatens each and every relationship he attempts after walking away from Kate.
Will life offer them a second chance at love or are old patterns simply too hard to break?

image

Picturing Perfect (Love of My Life #3) by Melissa Brown
Life may not turn out like we planned, but sometimes thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s what makes it perfectÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Hadley Foster has always been a planner. But, since the age of nineteen, things havenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t exactly gone according to planÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ not at all. And the changes continue to mount when a trip to Europe with her best friend starts a domino effect in all aspects of her life. Suddenly, the future she had envisioned for herself seems unlikely to happen. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s time to make a new planÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ or accept the dominoes as they fall.
Jason Kelly has a great life. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a successful self-published writer whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s living his dreams. But, something is missing. Hadley Foster. Letting her slip through his fingers is one of his biggest regrets. Over time, he had to accept the idea of being without his first love as he watched her fall in love with someone else.
When circumstances bring Jason and Hadley back into one anotherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s lives, theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re forced to deal with their past, their present and the possibility of a future together.

image

Unwanted Stars (Love of My Life #4) by Melissa Brown
ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s funny how the tiniest of things can change your lifeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ an invitation, a simple kiss goodnight, a matchbookÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Auden Kelly is in need of a change.
SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s trading in her nine-to-five sales job for the adventure of a lifetime: a one year contract with a European tour company.
For one full year, Auden will get paid to see the world. What could be better? Her brother gives her a journal, instructing her to document all of her adventures as she travels from country to country. And thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exactly what she does.
When a mysterious stranger enters her life, however, everything changes: her expectations, her priorities and her view of the world. And nothing for Auden will ever be the same.
